content.body:
For text added with CSS `::after`/`::before`/`content` is there agreed-upon expected behavior for find-in-page? Itâ€™s not actually specified anywhere, right?

Safari and Chrome find-in-page donâ€™t match on it, but Firefox does.
content.formatted_body:
For text added with CSS ::after/::before/content is there agreed-upon expected behavior for find-in-page? Itâ€™s not actually specified anywhere, right?

Safari and Chrome find-in-page donâ€™t match on it, but Firefox does.

content.body: It's not specified. https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#find-in-page is all we have.

So the opinion from backend: we don't have limit, and that's fine because adding a subscription is pretty cheap actually for backend and there has been no impactful abuse so far (there are other sketchy server behaviors that have more impact)
